remarks: Implicit substitution of 2 classes for 2 setvar variables.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Aug-1995.)
statement:
vtocl2ga.1 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
vtocl2ga.2 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
vtocl2ga.3 $e |- ( ( x e. C /\ y e. D ) -> ph ) $.
vtocl2ga $p |- ( ( A e. C /\ B e. D ) -> ch ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B y $.
$d C x y $.
$d D x y $.
$d ch y $.
$d ps x $.
